commit message:
Use a FragmentStatePagerAdapter for flipping through images

Might *actually fix* the 12 month old memory leak. Android is a piece of shit.
Append Git hash to version names
Parse Pixiv IDs from source URLs
Create abstract class for API clients
Fetch lower resolution images on slow networks and small screens
Add static method for converting Tag arrays into Strings
Don't filter tags searched for by the user
Refactor search client tests into a base abstract class

Don't include image counts in search results

Too inconsistent and too unreliable
Move API client code into external library
Preserve search query across screen rotations
Fix action bar indeterminate progress bar
Start ImageViewerActivity when image gets selected
Show image metadata in ImageViewerActivity title
Mark SearchResult as having reached the last page
View on Web and View on Pixiv action items
Keep the screen on while in ImageViewerActivity
Include gradle wrapper and dependencies submodules in Git repo
Move README and LICENSE to root
Always fetch samples when bandwidth saving mode is enabled
Only keep screen on if enabled by user
Don't show action bar when fetching more images

Merge pull request #20 from vomitcuddle/api-settings

Merge API settings branch into develop

Merge pull request #21 from vomitcuddle/develop

Make master the main development branch again

Refactor SearchActivity to use search Intents

Launch a new instance of SearchActivity every time a new query is
submitted, instead of re-using the same instance.

This makes navigating through previous search results using the OS
'back' key possible.

Fixes #19
Fix a bug where the image viewer activity title sometimes did not get set
Fix endless scrolling bug in ImageViewerActivity

Use WebViews to display animated GIF images

Fixes #9

Use norilib's getColor method to color code tags

Fixes #18
Fix image viewer ActionBar toggle before image loads
Fix weird service dropdown layout on API 10
Dedicated icon for built in search suggestions
Fix ActionBar background in ImageViewerActivity on API 10
Fix horizontal scrolling in image viewer on API 10
Vertically center images displayed in WebViewImageFragment
Hide action bar icon in settings related activities
Use HTML to center images in WebViewImageFragment horizontally
Add the scrollbarStyle property to ListViews
Fix service name autocomplete dropdown on API 10
Verify tag filters before adding to the database
Don't search for default query if results include explicit content
